spell.legendary_spellbook.electric_burst: Unleashes a fan-shaped shockwave of electricity, electrocuting all enemies in its path.
spell.legendary_spellbook.summon_haunted: The brave spirits of soldiers dwelling within the armor arise to protect you. Now, you are the General who leads them to victory!
spell.legendary_spellbook.soul_end.guide: Condense soul energy into your weapon and strike the ground to release a devastating shockwave. Knocks back enemies and adds your weapon's damage to the spell power.
spell.legendary_spellbook.legendary_pala: Cloak yourself in an aura as heavy as Netherite, greatly increasing attack and casting speed. While active, every strike shatters enemy armor and causes severe bleeding.
